mapper.sql: t_id, t_store_name, t_site, t_phone, t_qr_code, t_create_time, t_end_time, t_states, t_explain, t_issuer, t_payment, t_money, t_views_num, t_collection_num,t_wechat,t_picture, nation,province,city,district,longitude,latitude

s.t_id, s.t_store_name, s.t_site, s.t_phone, s.t_qr_code, s.t_create_time, s.t_end_time, s.t_states, s.t_explain, s.t_issuer, s.t_payment, s.t_money, s.t_views_num, s.t_collection_num,s.t_wechat,t_picture, s.nation,s.province,s.city,s.district,s.longitude,s.latitude, e.t_id as enshrineId
mapper.select:
select
from t_store
and t_store_name like concat('%',#{tStoreName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and t_issuer = (select user_id from t_user where user_name = #{tIssuer,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
and district = #{district,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and province like concat('%',#{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
order by t_create_time desc

select
from t_store s LEFT JOIN t_enshrine e ON s.t_id = e.h_id where s.t_id = #{tId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select , (select t_id from t_enshrine where h_id = #{tId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and p_id = #{personId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) as enshrineId from t_store where t_id = #{tId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.delete:
delete from t_store where t_id in
'${ids}'
mapper.insert: insert into t_store (t_id, t_store_name, t_site, t_phone, t_qr_code, t_create_time, t_end_time, t_states, t_explain, _issuer, t_payment, t_money, t_views_num, t_collection_num, longitude, latitude) values (#{tId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tStoreName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tSite,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tQrCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tCreateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tEndTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tStates,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tExplain,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tIssuer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tPayment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tMoney,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tViewsNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tCollectionNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{longitude,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{latitude,jdbcType=INTEGER})
insert into t_store (t_id) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) on duplicate key update t_views_num=t_views_num+1
insert into t_store (t_id) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) on duplicate key update t_collection_num=t_collection_num ${addO} 1

insert into t_store
t_id,
t_store_name,
t_site,

mapper.update:
update t_store
t_store_name = #{tStoreName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t_site = #{tSite,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t_phone = #{tPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t_qr_code = #{tQrCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t_create_time = #{tCreateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t_end_time = #{tEndTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t_states = #{tStates,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t_explain = #{tExplain,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t_issuer = #{tIssuer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t_payment = #{tPayment,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t_money = #{tMoney,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t_views_num = #{tViewsNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
t_collection_num = #{tCollectionNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
t_wechat = #{tWechat,jdbcType=INTEGER},
t_picture = #{tPicture,jdbcType=INTEGER},
nation = #{nation,jdbcType=INTEGER},
province = #{province,jdbcType=INTEGER},
city = #{city,jdbcType=INTEGER},
district = #{district,jdbcType=INTEGER},
longitude = #{longitude,jdbcType=INTEGER},
latitude = #{latitude,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where t_id = #{tId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update t_store set t_store_name = #{tStoreName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t_site = #{tSite,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t_phone = #{tPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t_qr_code = #{tQrCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t_create_time = #{tCreateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t_end_time = #{tEndTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t_states = #{tStates,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t_explain = #{tExplain,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t_issuer = #{tIssuer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t_payment = #{tPayment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t_money = #{tMoney,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t_views_num = #{tViewsNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, t_collection_num = #{tCollectionNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, longitude = #{longitude,jdbcType=INTEGER}, latitude = #{latitude,jdbcType=INTEGER} where t_id = #{tId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
